text: Irana Turynska ScholarshipFor students who identify as a woman in their third year of the Bachelor of Architectural Design or first year of the Master of Architecture; worth up to $20,000.Carey Lyon ScholarshipFor full-time Architecture students who can demonstrate circumstances which impact their study; worth up to $37,500.Bruce Henderson Architects ScholarshipFor Bachelor of Architectural Design or Master of Architecture students who can demonstrate circumstances which impact their study; worth up to $30,000.
